title: beads-send should start the task
description: After creating a bead and linking it, automatically run 'task start' to begin tracking time

title: Set up taskopen for try workspaces
description: Add taskopen action to cd into try workspace directories from annotations

title: Set up taskopen for bead issues
description: Add taskopen action to open bead issues (bead:<id> annotations)

title: try-workspace should start the task
description: After launching a try workspace, automatically run 'task start' to begin tracking time

title: Set up taskopen for Freshdesk
description: Add taskopen action to open Freshdesk ticket URLs

title: try-workspace should add taskwarrior annotation
description: When launching try from taskwarrior-tui, annotate the task with the workspace path for later navigation

title: Add tmux/kitty session support for try shortcut
description: Spawn try in a new tmux/kitty window instead of taking over the current terminal

title: Prompt for bead type in beads-send
description: Currently defaults to task, should prompt for task/bug/feature

title: Handle +bw tag in beads-send to link to external ref
description: If task has +bw (bugwarrior) tag, link to existing external ref instead of creating new bead

title: Fix taskopen for Linear issues
description: taskopen needs to handle Linear issue URLs/references properly
